products.title: Bella Blackout Black Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella blackout black roller blind in black. Made to measure from 9.60 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Simple, bold and cohesive, their bella blackout black roller blind blends minimal style with practical design. A firm favourite, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout roller blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. At swift direct blind, quality comes first. Their roller blinds are expertly cut and assembled by their roller blinds team, with over 50 years of making blinds and curtains, not only do their blinds come with a quality finish, we provide a free five year guarantee on this product.
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx2043 fabric colour: black material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes

products.title: Bella Blackout Black Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Bella blackout black panel blind in black. Made to measure from 42.92 with free uk mainland delivery. This panel blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Simple, bold and cohesive, their bella blackout black panel blind blends minimal style with practical design. A firm favourite, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout panel blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. Panel blinds are great being used to create sections in large spaces, as they can be top fixed to ceilings and can span up to a massive 5 metres width and 3 metres drop! 
 
At swift direct blind, quality comes first. Their panel blinds are expertly cut and assembled by their panel blinds team, with over 50 years of making blinds and curtains, not only do their blinds come with a quality finish, we provide a free five year guarantee on this product.

products.title: Bella Blackout Black Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella blackout black electric roller blind. Made to measure from 138.17 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Simple, bold and cohesive, their bella blackout black electric roller blind blends minimal style with practical design. A firm favourite, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout electric roller blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. Due to their chain-free control options their electric roller blinds are inherently child-safe by design, and if you upgrade with the smart home hub, their electric roller blinds become controllable with your mobile phone. 
 
At swift direct blind, quality comes first. Their roller blinds are expertly cut and assembled by their roller blinds team, with over 50 years of making blinds and curtains, not only do their blinds come with a quality finish, we provide a free five year guarantee on this product.
